If you're looking for a chance to join the illustrious ranks of all the zombified guys walking around, look no further! Going to be a $what $when.
Good news: I found another crate of the strong stuff! Bad news: gonna be a $what $when, but if we're lucky, I'll be totally smashed by then.
Ok, I got a tip and I'm not even asking anything for it. Here you go: there's supposed to be a $what. I'll even tell you that we can expect it $when. No more free handouts.
Everyone take note of this, because some of these idiots can't remember their first name without a hint: there's going to be a $what $when. Good?
We heard over an encrypted channel that we're supposed to be getting a $what. We're not exactly sure, but we think it's supposed to be here $when. That's all we got.

Ahah, shit, I've seen everything now. A Dutyer playing another's meat flute.
Motherfucker, who ate my sausage? Gonna find that knob and teach him a lesson.
Lads, there are lots of stalkers with artefacts coming from the North.
Brothers in Jupiter, got word that you have a rat from the SSU. I bet my ass it's the one with the good weapon.
A campfire, some kissel, and sweets! Haha.
Fucking fat asswipe. Did you lose the armoury keys again?
Crikey, it was more fun around the trenches than it is in the base.
I think we've got a rat in here. Every raid so far has been a complete fuck-up... Stalkers just start blasting us before we even know.
We just ran into a flying black smoke cloud. What the hell?
What now, you wankers? Come and get me if you dare!
Don't go bothering the boss in the next couple of hours.
We jumped a couple of bitches and are going back to base.
One of my dudes been shot, can anyone come find us and take us to the base? Guys at the perimeter, can you help us?!
feelin pretty shit. Who cares, Ima have myself a beer, HEHE.
Damn, I don't get it. Where's my shooter?
Ehh... I haven't seen my mother in a long while since I joined this business.
Fucking state. You don't get shit from them, you turn the other direction, and they ruin your life for nothing.
Olivius, we've got another rat. The hidden stuff was completely gone. Go break some heads for me.
I'm pouring one out for my good buddy, Andryushka! No more swag for you, pal.
What is this, a zoo? I want the poker table cleaned out of the armoury right fuckin now! Don't make me get Nikita!
Why do we give two shit whether you're drunk or not? Just do your job and get off the channel!
Organizing night raids - looking for a couple more dudes who can swing a gun. Meet us round back of the boss's place.
No, no, no, you dumbshits! This is the counterfeit - where did the real stuff go?
New batch of Kalashnikovs. Olivius is giving them away... for a price.
Girls is really what we need in here. Shit is so boring at night. Well, apparently they don't keep.
Ever miss the good ol' days? Well, those were shitty too, so don't kid yourself. But... the chumps weren't packing like they are now.
Is there enough brainpower in this entire place to get a secure signal from Dark Valley to Jupiter? I mean, what the hell? I thought Limpid had this figured out.
Spare a thought for those suckers in the Vehicle Graveyard. Sorry boys!
If I find you doing that again, it's going up to Sultan. The bosses decide what we make, so get that through your fat skull.
We got hit by the fucking army boys. I can't tell how many of us made it out, I'm on my own.
Too bad for him: he shouldn't have been swaggering around without looking and now he's paid for it. Just leave him - we can't carry him back.
Sweet! This guy was some sort of artefact collector! Get them while you can - I'm selling em cheap!
He's been gone a long time... something isn't right about this. I think he turned on us.
Niles! Get in the channel! Niles!
My old man would be proud of us, lads. We've really made it in here.
Happy boss, happy life. Just you remember that, you little piss-ants.
Hey eggheads! Want some guards? We're looking for some work. You want some real men to watch over you?
I can confirm that our inside guy in you know where is done for. Either he lost his head, or they sniffed him out.
Hey, slacker assholes: I heard Sultan is coming down personally to check on things. So I would get your shit together.
If you keep stealing the medicinal liquor, don't expect anything pleasant when you come in for surgery. Bunch of fucking animals.
All Clear Sky personnel, remember to use the private channel. Update the security codes regularly. Otherwise, don't complain if bandits ambush you again.
All important information must go to the private channel.
People! Novikov needs urgent help, he needs spare parts for upgrades and repairs. Go find everything he asks for. If we don't help now, we'll be shooting from our fingers before long!
Requesting Fruit Punch samples, please report back to Professor Kalancha once you acquire enough.
A lot of stalkers make the same mistake. The water in the Swamp is highly radioactive, so keep your distance. Keep plenty of anti-rad pills on hand, you never know when you'll need them.
Church garrison, we've lost contact with a research team in your area. Move to their last known position and report.
We've received a new shipment of Veles detectors. The amount is limited, so sign your name up.
Librarian here. Take it easy on the rations, supply is limited and the next shipment won't arrive any time soon.
Hey Nimble, why don't you come back? Remember the good ol' days?
New Vortex anomalies have been spotted near the entrance, watch your step on your way back.
Clear Sky is recruiting new members, preferably stalkers with great knowledge in anomalous fields. Contact Cold for more info.
There are signs of bandits camping in the northern farms. Don't let them get comfortable.
This is the deep recon team: we're trying the public channel because we can't get a hold of anyone. If you hear this, please respond!
Any information on Jackal's team is being requested; we're not giving up, but it's not looking good.
Mutant hostility confirmed to be increasing for the fourth straight week.
Any researchers currently in the field: there's been reports of an unusual Electro anomaly in field U4. Please investigate with caution.
This is Librarian again: I'm putting out another request of stalkers with any culinary knowledge whatsoever. Extra rations and supplies to any volunteers.
Please keep private communications off the channel. Radio triangulation is not a joke.
We've found no evidence of rumors of a "super-Chimera" north of the pump station. Still, you might want to take caution over there.
Kalancha is putting out another request for equipment: CO2 incubators, spectrophotometers and propane tanks.
More sounds of engines to the north and west - seems like the military is up to something.
Clear Sky is now offering commissions to Free Stalkers for the procurement of artefacts, ammunition and medical supplies. Please inquire with Spore for more details.
Cold, this is one of the exploratory teams in Yantar. Sakharov just told us something very interesting about surge predictions - we're coming back now.
Requesting permission to head north: not many artefacts in the marked fields.
Testing the new encryption. Is it working?
Please send someone to help me carry this back to base. Got some good stuff today! I'm in field F1.
You are a master, Novikov! The new rupture-resistant armor is working as intended!
This is Kalancha, reminding all stalkers to check body and clothes radiation frequently. If you record above-average readings, come and see me immediately.
Looks like the army detachment is raiding the renegade camp. I tell you, my lads, there's not a better show in the world!
Surveillance team: stay alert. We have reports of hostiles moving in your direction.
We need medical supplies brought to L9! We can't risk moving him. Hurry!
Accepting volunteers for research guard duty. Good pay and a new mask are offered for anyone with proven dependability.
Attention to all field teams: thugs have set up an ambush near one of the anomaly fields. Stand by while we get better intel.
Clear Sky is willing to share research results in exchange for ammunition. There is a vetting process.
You can sound the all clear: apparently this kid couldn't tell the sound of a Flesh from a Chimera.
Somebody better fix this damn roof if they don't want rain getting in the equipment. I know we live in a swamp, but really!
Infiltration team: the anomaly maps you were issued were out of date! Either go slow, or return to get the updated maps.
Pack it in - this place is definitely empty. On to the next location.
Glacier, your transmission is completely garbled. Where are you contacting us from?
Spore, this is Gleb Indian. I found all of Professor's stuff just neatly stacked next to the train tracks. What the hell do you think happened?
Attention, all squads: upon your arrival at the base, immediately report to the command post for instructions on the use of our new equipment models.
Attention to all squads that are in or near square e15! Confirm the presence of highly dangerous mutants in this region immediately! This information has been received from an unverified source.
Attention to all squads that are in or near square h23! Confirm the presence of highly dangerous mutants in this region immediately! This information has been received from an unverified source.
Calling all free squads! Bandit activity has once again risen in the Garbage. Clean up the sector.
Any stalkers assisting us in clearing out the path to the Bar will be rewarded.

Sergeant Saykin speaking, Fifth Squad. I'm addressing the people who committed vandalism yesterday at Rostok, on Duty grounds. If one more bottle flies through the window in Petrenko's office, any perpetrators will be shot.

Duty needs experienced and brave fighters to replenish their ranks and destroy mutants. To all those who joined our ranks, the Bar will conduct a special pricing policy. Former hoodlums are an exception!

Duty is announcing an enlistment. Any volunteer should show up at the base of operations in Rostok with a weapon, gear, and enough provisions for three days. IDs are not required. Good physical conditioning is encouraged.

We will warn you once again, anarchists. If you do not cease to send abrasive insults to the PDA of General Voronin, we will be paying your base a visit. You don't think we aren't aware of who's been doing this?
Enter the private channel and download the security update. If some lazy ass doesn't patch and info ends up leaking, he's a dead man.
Patch through all raid and mutant-related intel to the private channel. We really wouldn't want a leak.
Some brand-new SVDs have arrived in the warehouse. Anyone interested get a move on.
This is the recon team. We just saw some kind of black flying smoke in the Wild Territory. Waiting for instructions. Over.
We need experienced stalkers for a mutant raid. Payment is appropriate.
We need experienced stalkers to raid mutant hideouts. Adequate payment.
We need experienced stalkers for a snork culling operation. Payment will be generous.
Petrenko speaking. Zhivoderov, Arnie's asked you not to come to him if you capture anyone, as he doesn't have free cells at the moment. Keep them at your place for a day, and Arnie will pay you.
Petrenko, show the fuck up! What's wrong with the private channel? Down again?!
Petrenko, come in! Checking connection. My radio's broke, and I'm texting in the general channel. Sent a trooper with repair tools to the place where we'd been nailing boars yesterday.
Petrenko, this is Captain Sorokin from the Garbage speaking. Where's our ammunition?
Stalkers, join Duty! We shall cure our Earth from the deadly disease called the Zone!
Stalkers, join Duty. Protect the planet from the Zone's affliction!
Stalkers, remember: anarchy represents chaos, destruction, and death. Join Duty! Maintain order and purity in the Zone!
Stalkers, join us in our collective duty to protect and rid the world of the mutant invasion and anomalous infestation!
Okay, guys, I've received information about a group of mercenaries lingering on the outskirts of Rostok. Eyes peeled.
We have been experiencing technical difficulties with the equipment for the last two days. The connection to the database and the squads is acting up.

Captain Simonov speaking. Reporting about a strange type of mutant. An hour ago in b15, my squad and I observed a bizarre bloodsucker. It attacked a controller and decimated it with several blows before our very eyes. The beast didn't spot us. Awaiting orders.
Petrenko speaking. Kolya, confirm the info about the 10th Squad not returning from yesterday's raid. I think I've found what's left of them...
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your lucky kills.
This is why you buy an Exoskeleton... that thing hit like a train.
Squad marksmen: Corporal Grebenko is offering to zero your optics if you've been neglecting it.

This is the fourth exterminator squad: the nest turned out to be an entire underground tunnel network. We set a fire inside and shot them to pieces as they came out. We stacked the bodies and burnt them.
It appears someone is selling the collected artefacts to stalkers. We're going to set a guard on them from now on.
Vehicle Graveyard outpost: sit tight for the rest of the day. Apparently, Spetsnaz are doing an operation in the south.
Stalkers are reporting disappearances between Agroprom and Yantar. Do we have permission to investigate?
Soldiers who do not show up to physical conditioning are not liable for a vodka ration.
We just received a distress transmission from the south-east! We're going to investigate - cautiously. I've seen traps set before.
Any outsider caught wearing a Duty uniform or Duty insignia will be punished with execution.
We're not waiting here without backup any longer. I take full responsibility for this, but I'm not getting my men killed in such a stupid way. We're pulling back until we get reinforcements.
All squads returning from northern patrols must be cleared by the medic before nightfall. No exceptions!
Attention! An unknown gas leak in square b41 has just been detected. Take appropriate measures.

If you feel your body grow heavy as the world begins to lose its colours and a jaundiced veil appears before your eyes, try to leave that area as soon as possible. You are most likely falling under the direct influence of the alternating field of psy-emissions!
Requesting helicopter to the central mobile lab in square y6_4.
There has been a burst of variable psy-emissions in sector y2_4. Be extremely careful.
Militarised research groups remind military stalkers that a SEVA-class suit will not provide you with adequate protection against many anomalous effects. Use an SSP-class suit.

Militarised research groups remind all unregistered individuals in the territory of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone that you can approach one of our mobile bunkers and surrender. You will not be shot, you will be provided with all necessary medical assistance, and you will be consigned to the SSU at the earliest opportunity.
Any recruits among the military forces at Yantar should contact me, Professor Sakharov, immediately.
Professor Ozersky, please contact us immediately. This concerns your latest research.
Northern mobile lab, how long are we supposed to wait for those important anomalous samples from you? Enough with this absurdity!

Dear soldiers and undocumented individuals! Militarised research groups and the Scientific Research Institute of the Chernobyl Anomalous Zone would like to remind you that vodka does not contribute to the elimination of radionuclides. Use anti-radiation drugs instead.

Professor Hermann speaking. For the last two days, we have been waiting for the results of our psy-emission research from Professor Sakharov, however, he has been refusing to contact us. What is the meaning of this?
We need medical extraction immediately! One of our researchers fell into some Fruit Punch and he's not looking too good. Send someone to y7_1 now!
Field personnel: please stay attentive to the signs of an encroaching psy storms. Just because you checked the Emission schedule doesn't mean you can afford to be careless.
Substance analysis materials are on the way, but we do not have an exact time of arrival. In the meantime, consider checking your protective equipment into maintenance.
Expeditions must be authorized by the head of research for your sector. Without a special allowance, you must report all of your movements off-site. This procedure will be strictly enforced!
Professor Sakharov, we've just received the latest consignment of artefacts from the Duty team. Please have a storage chamber open for us.

I'm very sorry to say that we lost another research assistant today - he didn't realize he was standing in a psy field and... well, we put him down. If we can't get sensible volunteers, can we start hiring the mercenaries again?
This is a reminder that the supply helicopter only comes every two weeks and rarely on special occasions. If your research tour is coming to an end, make sure you don't miss the flight.
Ozersky, this is absolutely incredible! This unknown ring-like artefact is displaying exceptional responsiveness to stimuli - it's almost like it's a living organism!

The strange high-pitched ringing noise in the region of the Yantar facility seems to have stopped. We never located the source, but it was giving Professor Sakharov a migraine, so we're content that it's ceased.

This is the northern patrol detail, we need a biohazard quarantine set up immediately! We've come into contact with some sort of biological agent found in one of the old facilities here. We're making for the north of the base, so be ready for us.

Circumstances force me to remind all of you to be familiar with the functionality of your personal weapons. I know not all of you are well-trained in firearms, but you really need to know how to use them.

Professor Hermann speaking, the shipment from the southern lab arrived two days late and completely soaked through with rain. If I may ask, which trained monkey is responsible for this triumph of logistics?

This is Professor Sakharov, sending a general transmission to our colleagues near the Jupiter plant to remind them that special equipment requests go through me and not through Professor Hermann. If I hear any more rumors of locally-produced equipment being issued to field teams, I'm ordering an investigation.

This is Professor Hermann on the open channel, because Professor Sakharov refuses to answer my private messages, again requesting to know why Professor Koyev was reassigned from his project of the Ash Heap anomaly? This most irregular order was signed by our dear colleague in Yantar.

Professor Sakharov reminding all members the Ecological Research Personnel to not plagiarize any other research from either their own outpost or any other research facility. Professor Hermann would be wise to relay this to his own staff.

Professor Hermann here, reminding our field personnel that all equipment requests should be double-checked with the quartermaster before sending them out; this is especially true for requests made at Yantar station, as they are often burdened with so much work that they can't even get that right.

This is Professor Sakharov reminding all scientific personnel in the Zone that new research initiatives have to be approved by me and my staff. Failure to do this has often resulted in stupid and costly mistakes, especially in the more dangerous northern territories.

This is Professor Herman of the Jupiter Research Facility, and if anyone comes into personal contact with our colleague Professor Sakharov, I request that they ask him to his face why our electromagnetics research is being blocked by his transmissions department.

Professor Sakharov speaking, reminding our counterparts in Yanov that incident and observation reports have to conform to the document guidelines issued by the Institute. If we can't figure out what the hell you're trying to say, we doubt that anyone else can either.
I've run the test five times and I've calculated a different threshold every single time. What in the hell are we supposed to do now?
Hermann, Ozersky, anyone? We've just received reports of a Monolith force in the area and we're leaving. Leave these maniacs to the soldiers - I'd rather not get filled with lead today.
The perimeter warning system still isn't working. I know this because zombies just flooded into the camp and we had a pleasant time putting them down.
We appear to have a breach in a13 - we need a security team there, now!
Attention scientific personnel! A team is being assembled to explore reports of anomalous geological formations near Pripyat. If you have experience in that area of the Zone, please see the director.
Our stock of SSP-class suits is not due to be replaced for several weeks, so take good care of yours! Daily cleaning and disinfecting as well as weekly maintenance check-ins are required.

This is Professor Makarenko attempting to contact the northern bunker - our research was interrupted by the intrusion of a nearby skirmish. We couldn't tell who was fighting, but a very high volume of fire was observed, so we broke from our position.

This is an important reminder to all personnel in the Zone, legal or otherwise: Emissions have been known to alter the position of formerly fixed anomalies. This process is not yet fully understood by researchers, so please do exercise special caution after surges. Some anomaly fields, however, do not change position but have been known to increase or decrease in intensity.

I'll do this on the public channel for anonymity's sake, but I can no longer stay silent. This whole expedition is a madhouse run by egotistical monsters. The practices and conditions of this place are utter insanity, and I'll be doing all I can to expose this to the press when my tour is over. If I survive that long.
Apparently members of the Health Advisory Board are making the rounds today. Get things cleaned up and get all the research guards on duty.
Attention! Just recently, our fighters were attacked by DUTY SOLDIERS, disguised as mercenaries. Be careful, guys. Something smells fishy.
All volunteers who join Freedom will be issued the latest Zone survival kit free of charge, along with the finest weaponry from the West! If that ain't enough, you get a head start of 2500 roubles!
To all our guys: get into the private channel and update your security codes at once. Don't clog up the channel with whining about the fact that Duty's found out about your next attack.
Join Freedom! We'll stop anyone from seizing the Zone!
Long live Freedom! With the help of the Zone, we'll make the world a better place!
Any data on the movement of mercenary squads should be left in the private channel at once. This is important.
If you're out doing a job, keep any important info in the private channel. There are people out there reading our stuff, you know!
Download the new firmware so that you don't get as many crashes.
Leshiy, where the hell have you headed off to? The boss is waiting for you in the office.
Loki, it's Lukash. Contact me privately. Got an important matter.
Max, it's Skinflint. The supplies are gonna be here in a week, hold on tight over there.
Lukash, for three days now, we've been getting nothing but dead air from you. What are we gonna do about the Monolith while they haven't crucified us?

Oi, Mishka, there was something I wanted to tell you yesterday... but I keep forgetting. Anyway, I saw a suspicious group of people to the west of our base, near the farmstead. Don't forget to tell Lukash about this, or you're just gonna get baked and let it slip your mind.
Looking for friendly company, sincere conversations, and a helping hand in future campaigns? Join us and fight alongside free men of the Zone!
They've brought in a shipment of new G36s to the warehouses. Better get 'em quick. There's practically a waiting list for them.
We going out for lunch, or what?
We're in need of experienced stalkers for an artefact hunt. We'll owe you one.

Free stalkers, Freedom speaking! If you want to live under respectable conditions in the Zone without any obligations from the military, like Duty, then come to us! We're always happy to see new faces.

Free stalkers, Freedom speaking here! What do you have to gain by consciously limiting yourself to a life under the command under a bunch of bureaucratic pigs, living in their barracks and blindly following their orders? Become a part of us and join our expeditions to the most treasured places in the Zone, tasting the life of a free man!
Greetings, stalker! It's me, your Freedom! Come visit me at my address any time: Army Warehouses, straight down the road and towards the right at the fork. ;)
Rostok today, the Verkhovna Rada tomorrow, and the whole world in two days!
Seems like they took out a massive group of zombies at Yantar today, in the workshops. There might still be a few left.
Skinflint, where'd you put all the fancy shooters? Why am I not seeing them in the armoury?

Stalker, don't you love the Zone? Have you forgotten that it gave you money and a purpose in life? Do you really want to work as an office clerk for a penny after all this is over? Join Freedom! Don't let them take away the last thing you value from you, and don't let them take away your life.
Don't spit in the bloody glasses, damn it. I'll fucking break someone's nose the next time I hear that happens.
Hey-hey-hey, rasta! We've got the best and juiciest joints! Join the real Freedom and take down the system!

This is Skinflint. I've just received a small batch of American erotic magazines...
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Who the bloody hell needs those, you bellend? Everyone outside of the Zone has been using hard drives for years now, us included.
We duped a couple of bandits yesterday. I'm surprised they even remember to wear their pants each day, 'cos they're so bloody dumb!
There's a literal army of undead in Yantar going up in number everyday... What the hell we can do?...
I'm feeling creative today! Oh, I'll express myself by hanging a few Dutyers on the branches!
Chaps, guess what! The ganja, the one growing near da springboard! It hits like a truck! Hahahaaa!!!

Ok, we need to wake the fuck up - clocking out is fine around the base, but not if people are counting on you to defend the Barrier. I'm going to have Gatekeeper going around planting his foot in the asses of any slackers.
My dudes, there's something nasty prowling around here - it's giving me the creeps. I'm not talking about Solid either...

Yo, come on down to Skinflint's place and get all this free shit I'm giving away! I just don't give a fuck anymore!
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Skinflint
%c[default]Can someone shut up this asshole?
Yo Loki, these anomaly fields are going crazy over here. I'm no egghead, but I know something's up.
All this time, and Yanov station still smells like Duty. It's like... cosmoline and frustration.
This is starting to feel way too much like work...
What's wrong, Ashot? Not enough of a man to say it to my face? I can see you now, typing away on your little keyboard with a stupid grin on your face. You've gotten soft, my man.
We lost another group up near Pripyat. Damn... I knew some of those guys. I wish I knew what happened to them.
I don't care if you're a vegan or whatever else - you need to be ready to put down those radioactive beasts out there, so pack a shooter, ok? Where do we get these people...
The Syndicate is recruiting new employees. To join us, find an intermediary. Consider this your first assignment.
Information on mutant raids and other operations can be bought from an intermediary. Look for one near the Prometheus Movie Theatre.
We need experienced stalkers for targeting specific groups.
We need experienced stalkers for carrying out raids in Pripyat. Our targets are Monolith groups, contact us for more info.
Requesting an experienced mechanic with knowledge of PNV devices. The payment is decent.
Join the Mercenaries, excellent outfit and decent payment are waiting for you when the job gets done!
Molfar, some mutants managed to get our guys at the plant. It is necessary to do some clean up.
Urgent need for a good sniper, paying 15 percent of the cost of the contract...
Attention, all Syndicate employees: Kiril Yatagan's group is no longer partnered with us. Seems he has his own plans...
Andrew Lunev, nicknamed Old. There's a bounty on his head. Any information about his location will be met with good payment.

Looks like those stalkers just won't give up... Yes, I see you chucklefucks out in the reeds, making your way to the Waste Processing Station. Here's a little hint: bullet in the head, not even kidding.
I managed to make my way into Pripyat, but the activity of the Monolith squads is preventing me from breaking through...
We suggest you stay away from the Jupiter Factory. We lost contact with the last group we sent over there.
Looking for an experienced stalker, preferably a veteran tracker. Contact us for more information.
An experienced mediator is needed, payment depends on performance.
Recruiting new fighters. Former employees of the special SOBR forces will be given special consideration.
Calling all artefact hunters out there: one of our important clients is requesting specific artefacts. If you're good enough for the job, contact us as soon as possible.
I've noticed an increased number of visitors lately. Any suspicious activity near our base will be dealt with, permanently. You've been warned.

Artyom Sagitov, called Locomotive, was found last night attempting to infiltrate the waste processing plant. He was found by a security team and shot. If you wish to claim the body, contact Dushman.\nYet again, we remind you not to interfere with Syndicate business.
Yevgeny Vorontsov, known as Yarmuk, was executed yesterday for attempting to spy on one of our operation teams.\nConsider this your last warning.
Johannes Zhmyev, nicknamed Chancellor, was just identified as a casualty after he and some other stalkers attempted to ambush a patrol squad.\nWe are tracking down the remaining offenders.
Simeon Mlakar, known as Trumpet, was caught falsely wearing Syndicate insignia and put to death. That is our operating procedure.\nDon't make the same mistake.
Attention to the Ukrainian Armed Forces: your infiltration squad led by Sergeant Boyko has been eliminated by our security forces.\nWe hope this demonstration has been instructive.
Shit! Come in Aslan! We can't get you on the comms! Everything's fucked, the deal went sideways and at least two of our men are down. We need help, now!
We are currently looking for an explosives expert - plastic, accelerants, detonators. Our last guy wasn't as good as he said.
Watch your maps when you are in the vicinity of our outposts - we do not give warnings.
This is horseshit. I'm not getting paid half enough for this.
Who the hell are these people? We've got four - no... five corpses in the street and we have no idea who they are. I don't recognize these colors.
Ok, radio silence in this sector for the next two hours. Mouths shut, eyes open!
On peut les voir maintenant. Tu es pret?
Wo ist jeder? Ich bin ganz allein hier draussen.
Anyone familiar with accurizing high-caliber precision rifles? I'm looking to improve the groupings on my .338.
Seeking sellers of ballistic plates in high volumes. Ceramic or polycarbonate materials preferred.
From now on, everything's going on the private network. I don't want to see any of you using this channel.
Respond! Alex? Anyone? We can't see anything, but the GPS says they should be right here. I think I - there's something strange going on here. Have we checked for spatial anomalies in the area?
No visual on the chopper yet. The pilot knows the anomaly maps, right? Let's hope he does...
This is a broadcast from the outpost in the Pripyat bookstore:\nWe're looking for high-volume ammunition trades, open to free stalkers.
This is a broadcast from the outpost in the Pripyat bookstore:\nWe're in the market for local anomaly maps and navigation routes. Don't be shy! Working for us can be lucrative.
This is a broadcast from the outpost in the Pripyat bookstore:\nThis is a friendly warning that we've been seeing Monolith troops hiding out in some of the buildings. Use extreme caution in the area.
Meeker said that he left it near the old shopping center and it wasn't there on the next day. I think they took the bait.

Base, this is Delta squad. We've located the entrance to the Dark Valley lab. What are our orders?
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Bloody hell! Switch to the private channel!

Base, this is recon team Nightbird. We're having encryption problems and are leaving a message here. Landed in Limansk and the building site seems impenetrable. Large concentration of enemy forces: eight RPGs, five snipers, and four with additional, unknown weapons. We cannot send our coordinates, and our enemies are surely listening in on the general channel. What are your orders?
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Copy, Nightbird. Return to the Red Forest immediately and regroup with Vulture. Make further decisions from there on out.
Attention! When trying to cross the perimeter, the soldiers guarding it have the right to open fire on you without warning. Do not take chances and do not break the law.
To all military stalkers operating in the area around the Darkscape and the Cordon: switch to the encrypted channel! That's an order!
All military stalkers should establish comms on the double! Everybody assemble in the channel.
Radio frequencies are cut off in square a4_4. Please report from another location near the anomalous zone.
Citizens! The Zone poses mortal danger! We're here to protect you from the Zone, not the Zone from you. Do not jeopardise your life! Do not try to penetrate into the secured area!
Requesting a helicopter in square a1_6.
Requesting a mortar strike on square e2_12.
Contracted soldiers and military stalkers: if anyone finds the wreckage of a fallen helicopter during one of the raids, please recover and deliver the flight recorder to Major Kuznetsov.
Colonel Kuznetsov, there will be an examination by two observers from the SSU tomorrow. Have a suitable reception ready.
Colonel Kuznetsov, get in touch immediately. Waiting for you in office #3.
Kestrel, it's Peony. Can you respond? There's no radio signal.
Guys, don't screw around in the ravine. Some rabid creatures have settled where we burned a few boxes a couple of days ago.
Attention, sappers: we require additional mines in square e3_16.

The Security Service of Ukraine is calling all right-minded and loyal citizens to collaborate with the authorities. Report all known cases of stalking! Only with your help can we eliminate this hideous phenomenon!
Need the defence at the northern pass strengthened in accordance with order #231. When is the armour coming in?
We've got a half-crazed and very dirty stalker at the checkpoint who won't stop yelling for Sergeant Spooner. We're going to keep him in holding until he calms down a bit.
We've discovered several crates of ammunition that have sustained water damage - the cartridges have serious rust. Well, there's another write-off.
Don't forget to pick up some grenades from the armory. We have reports of mutants in the north that are highly-immune to gunfire.
This is Captain Efremov - the engineering detachment you were supposed to send us hasn't arrived yet. Do you want our updated co-ordinates?
Seryoga! These supplies were supposed to be moved hours ago! If you don't shape up, I'm sending you out on night patrols.

I'm here. I'm here. I came with... I went and now I have... They're down, six men all down with terrible... What? Where is the... I can't even see it anymore. There's... something that's not... 
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Who the hell is this? Identify yourself!
Ischuk is dodging patrol duty again. Where the hell has he gotten to now?

Unauthorized personnel in the clearing near the border fence: you have one minute to clear out before we clear you out. Consider yourself lucky, because we often don't get the chance to give warnings.
Are they ever going to fix the fence? Everyone knows that's how they get in and out. Good luck getting command to pay for it.
Sweepers: you're clear to go. Just stay in the boundary markers and watch your step.
Kill the noise! You stupid - Shut up that racket! They're going to hear that!
Is anyone getting this? I'm in some serious trouble, I'm in some sort of industrial building - I got separated. Can you hear me?
Are the transports arriving today? We've got a guy who's not looking so good - needs a proper medical facility.
Environment protection is NOT optional. See the quartermaster if you have missing or damaged equipment.
Are we getting relieved, or what? Court-marshal me, I don't care, but we can't hold this position alone anymore. The sergeant would have agreed... while he was alive.
Short, controlled bursts, damn-it! Conserve the ammo!
They'll be fine, I know they will. Nikanorov has been in worse. I'll bet he'll show up in a couple of days with an artefact and a bottle of vodka.
Who gives a shit about asbestos? Get rid of the rads and the freaks of nature, and I'm set.
This is Bolt-2, finishing my pass. The target has been saturated with explosives - no visual contact. Heading back to station.
Yeah, I'll believe in vampires and fairy-tales when I see them with my eyes. Scientific aberrations are one thing, but you should hear the garbage that gets told around the campfire.
That call signal isn't in our records... is the SBU up to something again? It would be just like them to send in someone without telling us.
Report of an armaments cache in square a2_9. We'll set a guard on it until we can get it out of here.
Whoever is in the area: I just saw an unknown creature crawl over the encampment wall. This looks really bad.
Soldiers, do not meddle in areas with variable psi-emissions. You don't know what you contend with.
A squad was lost in the area of the cemetery of sunken ships, and we have no connection with them. Units in the area are to help them before they get into trouble.

I saw some kind of squad in our colours near Pripyat, behaving in a hostile manner and not allowing anyone to get near. I don't think these are ordinary deserters. They're headed towards the southern part of town.
Attention, soldiers of Wings at the Generators. The installation has been destabilised. Head to the bunker as instructed and begin fixing the problem immediately.
This is the storeman from the Yubileiny service centre. I'm quite worried. Are supplies expected in the near future? We don't even have enough 5.45.
Barrier-1 is in trouble at square aes2_m1. It seems they've spotted some humanoids, hardly zombies, moving at a steady pace.

A signal has arrived from the Sarcophagus. Shall I verify?
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Monolith
%c[default]Not possible. Too much background radiation and tons of creatures there. I've already told you.
Wings, come in. Are you at the objective yet?
There is no Wish Granter, but there is a group of people ahead of their time with power that knows no equal. Don't ruin the dream... With your support, we shall build a new world. A new reality.
All recruits should meet with Mentor immediately.
A horde of zombies is expected on the outskirts of Pripyat. Take action.
We have lost a detachment in Agroprom. Find them, dead or alive.
How many inquisitors are there, you say? Will a couple dozen not suffice? Well, shite. Mentor, best put your recruits to some training.
How's the situation at the Radar? Anything out of the ordinary?
Our commander's been worrying again. There's nothing to eat at the station. Where do we find provisions? My fighters will be passing on to human flesh before long.

Stalker, see what scientific activity has done to this world. It has challenged its foundations, and we need YOU to help make this world a better place. Based on the reality given to you, YOU must understand that with the help of the Brotherhood, everything becomes possible. A paradise on Earth? On the snap of your fingers. Give us your hand in supporting the existence of this miracle. Any future companions should arrive at any of our posts with arms and armour.
Where did Inquisitor's group go? We've got nothing to cover sector p_5 with.

Fellow scientists, give up your ungrateful job. All the fruits of your work shall sooner or later settle in the oligarchic minorities, and you will sink into oblivion. The brotherhood is in need of qualified specialists. Let us not offer you any rewards, but the ability for you to choose your own futures for yourselves and your loved ones.
A sentry has died by his own hand in the control room. Dispose of the corpse.
This is the squad at the station. We're running out of gear. Need help.
Inquisitors speaking. We'll be clearing out the approaches to Pripyat. Eyes sharp and clear. We work using computer.
Commander of the Barrier speaking. We have five unfettered deserters. If you meet them in the vicinity of Pripyat, open fire on them.
This is Rabbit. Shortly, we will be securing some new equipment. The men have promised that they are bringing something from the military in the Agroprom.
Perimeter breach detected in the southwest of the second barrier. Forces unknown. Response team is currently assembling.
Emir: we have reports of infiltrators in the Outskirts. Shall we take care of it?
Some of our soldiers are becoming dysfunctional. They require an uplink - we're out of stimulants.
This is a reminder that assignments in the hospital need to be no longer than five days sequentially. No more mistakes.
The Monolith is... distant today. Charon? Where are you, Charon?
Infection contained. This territory can be considered clean.
Brothers, my wounds are fatal. Fall back and I will destroy as many as I can.
Sentinels: your vigilance is expected and demanded of you. Let no concern turn you aside for your duty.
This is Talon's squad east of Radar. We have some wounded soldiers here, but we're unable to carry them for reinstatement. We're liquidating them and taking their gear with us.
Reports of armor movement to the far north-east of the Center. We'll be posting anti-vehicle units there. Just in case.

And I tell you, brothers, I looked into that black abyss and saw a therein a pillar of silver light. There was pain for a long time. It was when I awoke that I knew what I serve - that greatest of edifices... the very Monolith itself.
They have given in. Their bodies are pierced and broken. Their weapons have failed them. They had no hope against the inevitable. They are tread below the boots of the Monolith!
Our fallen will be avenged in the blood of our enemies. This is not our will - we have none such constraints. We are conduits for the Monolith, pillar of vengeance. It will have recompense.
This is Toltec's group: resistance was crushed. That one took longer than usual.
Resistance mounting south of the Center. Request rocket ordinance for the response team. We have everything else we need.
Routine patrol of Limansk bridge was interrupted by hostile fire. We're going to wait for the Emission. Monolith grant us the victory.
One of our corpses seems to have escaped. Dispatch teams north of Pripyat Outskirts as well as the river. This one may have information.
Every emission is a single step toward cleansing this planet.
Cleanse, purge, purify! Cleanse, purge, purify!
We shall start the war to end all wars.
Embark on the final crusade with us, stalker.
We wage war in the name of peace!
We shall excise the cancer of greed and malice from this sinful world.
The Zone gives, the Zone takes.
Oh, the almighty Monolith...
With our blood-stained hands we shall create a world of peace!
Repent.
Wallow in despair, infidels, for your time has come.
We are the harbingers of a new age.
Our deeds are atrocious, our intentions noble...
We are the necessary evil.
You cannot fight fate!
Artefacts are the fruit of the Zone.
We shall pave the way to peace with the skulls of our enemies.
Join us, or die! Join us, or die! JOIN US, OR DIE!!!
Overthrow the tyrants! Murder the murderers!
Fear the wrath of the Zone.
We shall slay millions for billions to live in peace.
Pay evil unto evil.
A period of violence, an eternity of peace.
Do not oppose the change.
Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $location.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing squad was found...
I was supposed to meet the other squad $location. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.
$mechanic speaking. Stop bringing your broken crap over here. I'm a mechanic, not a magician. I've got dozens to fix already and there isn't enough replacement parts for everybody around.
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your lucky kills.
$trader speaking. We received new shipment of ammo and medical supplies. I don't need to remind all of you again: take it easy on them, the amount is limited.
$trader here. The next shipment of armours and gas masks won't be ready for a week at least. The main supplier faced some difficulties, hopefully it won't be much of an issue.
I don't recall seeing this number of Vortex anomalies last time I came here in $map... They're spreading everywhere. Watch your step when you pass from this location.\n$speaker out
$mechanic here. I'm looking for steel plates and carbon fibre. So if you came by any damaged armours, make sure to bring them to me and I will give you discounts on repairing services.

$speaker here, reporting on the completion of our patrol for today: everything is very quiet, not a hostile spotted the whole way. It feels a bit eerie.\nI wouldn't call this sector safe for anything less than a fire-team.
Ok, we can confirm that we're at the insertion point. You can send $speaker over here with the engineers.

This is $speaker's squad, we just arrived at $location and the enemy force isn't here. Their equipment is scattered all around, they must have seen us coming.\nPlease advise, we're setting up a perimeter.
$mechanic just told me that the plates are ready for the armour re-fitting. Someone please get in contact with $trader, he's not answering direct messages.

We just got confirmation on co-ordinates of enemy observation post:

16', .6" North
13', 39.2" East

Please Verify

$mechanic here. If you just got your main return spring replaced last week, there's a good chance that it's out of spec - we've been having problems.\nCome by and I'll put one of the old ones back in.
$speaker was supposed to come by with his squad and relieve us, what gives? We're six hours overdue and we've got better things to do than stand around out here twiddling our thumbs.
This is $speaker... My squad has been attacked by $target several minutes ago $location. Requesting assistance immediately!
Help! We got jumped by $target $location.\nTwo of our squad are suffering from serious injury, we can't hold it any longer!
Attention! This is $leader. I got a report from one of the squads $location. Apparently they have been attacked by $target.\nTroops nearby must provide necessary assistance at once.
One of our squads went missing $location.\nThe last message I received from them was about spotting $target moving their way... Can any of our troops nearby check their location?
$speaker reporting in. A few minutes ago, I saw $target approaching our square. They are in big numbers, it's unusual...\nWe are $location. Send nearby troops over our location.
What's going on in $map? We lost contact with the squad $location.\nSomeone saw $target roaming the place, I need more info about the situation there.
Attention! This is $speaker's team in the north of $map, we got hit by some sort of mutant attack a few minutes ago - we couldn't make positive ID.\nWe lost a man, requesting orders, urgent!
$leader, this is $speaker. We just fought off an attack by $target. We're running low on ammo and more mutants seem to be coming.\nPlease advise, we need support!

$speaker speaking. Tell $leader that we just saw $target in a massive herd going west. I would estimate 30 to 40 of them.
Co-ordinates: 

14', .1" North

10', 55.6" East
Attention all squads, this is $leader. I've been receiving multiple reports of $target from all around $map.\nAny teams near that sector, expect contact.
Attention $leader, this is $speaker's squad. We just lost contact with our forward element after we saw $target heading that way.\nWe're pairing up with the adjacent squad to go relieve them.

This is $leader. Any patrols in $map should pull back to a position $location immediately. We've received intel of hostile movement, probably $target.\nStart moving immediately; it may be nothing, but we need to take precautions.
This is $speaker. Requesting assistance immediately!\nMy squad in $map has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago. We took position $location, hurry up!
Help! We got attacked by $target in $map. Three men from our squad are suffering from serious injuries, we can't hold it any longer!
We have spotted $target approaching our location $location. $leader, what are your orders?
A few minutes ago, my squad engaged $target $location. They fell back after killing two of them. One of my men got a serious injury.
$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $location, they might be preparing for something.\nAll squads near the place should take caution, report any unusual movement.
One of my men spotted $target heading our way. We took position $location. If they try something funny, they will pay for it. $speaker out.
I got a report from unknown source about $target preparing for an ambush in $map. All squads at the location must take extreme caution.
We opened fire on $target in $map after ignoring our clear warnings.\nLooks like more of them are heading this way, so we'll fall back and take position $location for now. $speaker out.
I've received information about possible raid in $map. Looks like $target are looking for trouble. Eyes peeled.
$leader, this is $speaker. After a long battle with $target $location, we managed to hold two captives.\nWhat do you want to do with them?

$leader, come in! We were ambushed by $target $location! We got into a cross-fire and we lost half of the squad!\nMost of us are injured and we pulled back to a defensive position.\nWe need reinforcements immediately! They're still coming in!
$speaker here. The enemy incursion has been wiped out; all of the $target have been neutralized.\nMost of them fell $location but we pursued the rest to the south. Orders?

This is the second recon patrol, we're taking fire from a sniper $location! We haven't got a good look, but we're pretty sure it's $target.\nWe can't move from this position. If you have any nearby squads that can approach the hostile from behind, send them!
Third fire-team in $map reporting: we're holding $location, but it looks like they're regrouping for another assault.\nWe're good on ammo, but most of my men have injuries.\nThey're starting again!

Report on the situation in $map: we haven't been fired on for several minutes and we don't know where they went.\nWe can confirm that all of the $target are not accounted for and we can't move forward without separating.\nPlease send backup, we will hold this position.

$speaker to $leader: we're keeping up the attack on $target $location, but they're holding firm. We've only suffered one casualty.\nIn a few minutes, we'll try an assault from multiple angles, will update.

We've been skirmishing with $target for several hours now. No casualties to report and we think we've killed two of them.\nRight now, it looks like they're holing up $location. Do you want us to stay on them?
This is $speaker. We met $target $location. One of them is suffering from a bad injury.\nI marked the location of our base for them. Make sure to provide them with medical assistance.
We got assistance from $target in $map.\n They have extra medical supplies. You can allow them to get into our base.
$target were asking for extra ammo. I met them $location. Looks like they're preparing for a hunting trip.
I saw $target roaming $location. They are searching for artefacts.\nOne of them, called $speaker, has found two at least. What do you think $leader? Sounds like a good deal.

I was talking to $target we met $location. Their commander, $speaker, mentioned unusual number of mutants heading this way.\nMy squad took position and they agreed to provide necessary assistance. Waiting for orders.
Just found dead bodies of $target here in $map, or what's left of them... Seems like some wild mutants got those poor guys.\nI'm about to reach my destination $location. $speaker out.
$speaker here. The hostiles we were tracking turned out to be $target.\nWe asked them if they had seen any activity and they hadn't. We're leaving them $location and finishing our patrol.

We just ran across $target when they were under attack by mutants $location. Together, we managed to fight them off.\nOne of their men is in critical condition. Requesting permission to take them back to our outpost for treatment.
$leader: we were looking for our lost man and we found him with $target $location. They had found him and patched him up.\nWe're giving them some ammo because they're low. $speaker out.

This is $speaker's team reporting! After a whole day without comms or navigation, we were found by $target and they took us back to their camp.\nWe should be able to head out in a few hours thanks to their help.
We just found those missing $target wandering around in $map. They appear to be suffering from some sort of mental condition, maybe psy damage.\nOrders? We'll keep a close eye on them.
Fourth assault squad: We arrived $location and found $target already there. They're willing to help us out. We'll contact you as soon as we set up a perimeter.
We came by $target on our way back. They're preparing for a raid on mutants spotted $location.\nWe'll join them and split the meat.

Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $location.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing group was found... I wonder what happened.
I was supposed to meet the rest of my group $location. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.
$mechanic speaking. Stop bringing broken shit to me. What I'm supposed to do with an gun missing half the parts?!
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your amazing adventures.
$trader speaking. We received new shipment of ammo and medical supplies. I don't need to remind all of you again: take it easy on them, the amount is limited.
$trader here. Don't expect the next outfit shipment to arrive any time soon. We lost contact with our local supplier.
It's $speaker. Something is not right... Electro anomalies are spreading $location.\nJust watch your step when you want to pass by.
$mechanic here. I'm missing steel plates and carbon fibre.\nIf you came by any damaged armours, make sure to bring them to me and I will give you discounts on repairing services.
$trader, can you get in contact with $speaker and his group? They're moving way too far north past the safety markers and we can't get them on the radio.\nHave you heard from them?

This is $trader, reminding you that theft is not tolerated. If you know who swiped the stimpacks from the last shipment, contact me immediately.\nIf we find out later, then you will receive the same punishment as the thief.

This is $mechanic back at the camp. If anyone comes across replacement parts for night-vision optics, we are desperately short of them.\nThat means that you can make quite a bit of cash if you bring some in.

Hey, $trader, you're never going to guess what we found. Just fifty yards from camp we discovered an observation outpost with some monitoring equipment someone left behind. It was covered pretty well in foliage and we literally tripped over it.\nWho do you think we can thank for this?
Shit, somebody better get a hold of $mechanic; our secondary power grid went down - completely dead, we don't know what to do.\nWhy can he never just pick up his damn radio?
$trader here, checking in on the situation $location. It's been over an hour since we've had a report, what gives?

Hey, $speaker, there's no change with that developing anomaly. It hasn't moved closer to the ground, but it does appear to be increasing in intensity.\nI think it's probably some sort of space anomaly, but others are saying it looks like a gravity concentrate. I don't think it will impede our business.
This is $speaker... My group has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago $location. Is there anyone nearby!
Help! We got jumped by $target $location. I lost two of my men already, we can't hold it any more...
$leader here. I got a report from the group $location.\nApparently they have been attacked by $target. I'm not sure if they made it, is there any group nearby who can assist them?

$speaker speaking. One of our groups went missing $location.\nThe last message I received from them was about spotting $target moving their way... I'm gonna check out their location, any volunteers around?
Hey! it's $speaker. A few minutes ago, I saw $target heading our way. They are in big numbers, it doesn't seem good at all...\nWe are $location. Wish us some luck.
What's going on? We lost contact with the group $location.\nSomeone saw $target roaming the place, is there anyone around who can give us more info about the situation?
Uh, $leader, it's $speaker. We're moving east in $map because we're being shadowed by some sort of mutant pack, $target maybe.\nWe're not equipped to handle this many, what should we do?

This is $speaker speaking. My guys haven't been able to move out from their position $location for several hours because of $target. We're holding fine, but there's no way we're going out there.\nPlease send someone to help as soon as you can.
Hello, come in! $speaker is dead, but we managed to kill the $target that ambushed us. We're $location and we have no other casualties.\nWe're heading back to base as soon as possible.
Hey, this is the group $location reporting in. We attacked those mutants as ordered, but they seem to have run off.\nWe're looking now, if we can get a spot on them, we'll let you know.
$leader, are you there? This is $speaker! The entire team is fucking dead! They got killed by $target.\nI'm holding $location, but they might come back. Orders?

This is $leader to all of our guys in $map. We just had $speaker and his squad go check out some noises $location and we lost contact with them.\nAnyone in the area: I want some eyes on that location; don't go charging in, just watch it for a while.
This is $speaker. We need backup!\nMy group has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago. We're taking cover $location, hurry up!
Shit.... Help! We got attacked by $target in $map. I lost two guys already, we can't hold it any longer!
We just saw $target heading over here, $location. $leader, what's going on???
A few minutes ago, my group opened fire at $target $location. They fell back after killing two of them at least.\nWe can't stay here, I'm moving somewhere else...
$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $location, they might be preparing for something.\nGroups near that place should take extra caution.
One of my men spotted $target heading our way $location. If they tried something stupid, they're gonna pay for it. $speaker out.
Guess what? I just heard that $target are preparing for an ambush in $map.\nDon't take a walk in there, get your ass out.
We opened fire on $target, those idiots were pointing their guns toward us.\nLooks like more of them are coming this way.... Shit, we'll fall back and wait for them $location for now. $speaker out.
What's the deal? Just got some info about possible raid in $map. Looks like $target are looking for trouble. Watch out guys.
$leader, this is $speaker. We had a big gunfight with $target $location. We made it alive, and we have two captives right here.\nWhat should we do with them?
Ok, this is $speaker. $target in the area have been taking potshots at us for half an hour.\nWe're not sure what they're up to - we don't want to start a firefight.
This is the garrison $location and we just caught some sort of spy in our camp, can't say who he is yet.\nWhat should we do with him? You should probably send someone to pick him up.
$leader, come in! We've been noticing $target in large numbers around $map.\nThe last info we got said that it was safe to move. We're staying put.
Anyone made contact with $speaker or his guys? They said they were going silent because of $target in the area.\nIt's been too long, they should have reported by now.
Ok, this is $speaker and we just received an unprovoked attack by $target.\nThey got wiped out, no idea what they were thinking.
Shit! We were just about to set up $location when we found out that this place is crawling with $target.\nWe need $leader to send help!
$speaker here. We managed to push those $target out of their position $location.\nWe're worried that they might get support and counterattack.
This is $speaker. We met $target $location. One of them is suffering from a bad injury.\nI'm gonna point out our hideout for them, you can give them some medkits.
We got assistance from $target in $map.\nThey're nice people, we got some extra medical supplies from them as well. We will stick with them for a while until we reach our destination.
$target were asking for extra ammo. I met them $location. Looks like they're preparing for a hunting trip.

Hey guys, check this out. $target are roaming $location. Looks like they are searching for artefacts.\nOne of them, called $speaker, has found two at least.\nGoddamn it... I wish I didn't forget my Bear detector.

I was talking to $target we met $location. Their commander, $speaker, mentioned an unusual number of mutants heading this way.\nLooks like those guys are gonna help us out. We will take cover and prepare our guns.

Damn... Just found dead bodies of $target here in $map, or what's left of them at least... Seems like some freaking mutant ate those poor guys.\nI'm about to reach my destination $location. $speaker out.
So we came by $target on our way back. They're preparing for a big raid on mutants $location.\nWe'll join them and split the meat... hehe...
Well, thanks to $target, we avoided walking into an ambush.\nWe're going to wait with them for awhile until we continue our journey to $map.

$speaker here. We found a group of $target holding a position $location.\nApparently, they've been fighting off a mutant attack since last night. We're going to team up and make sure the threat is over.

Hey, we just received a visitor $location.\nHe said that he and his team of $target were searching for artefacts when they got ambushed. He's pretty sure that he's the last survivor.\nWe're going to let him stay with us.
$speaker never showed up and we can't wait around any longer.\nWe teamed-up with $target that were hanging around and they're going to help us search the place.
Alright, this is $speaker. We just ran into a group of $target and they told us that they saw the missing squad $location just a few hours ago.\nShould we take a look?
Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $location.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing group was found...
This is $speaker. We are supposed to meet the other scientists $location. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.

$mechanic speaking. I've noticed a lot of people bring me broken Bear detectors to fix. Keep in mind that those devices are limited, I don't have the necessary parts for every detector out there. Take care of your detectors guys.
It seems that the last emission has completely ruined the psi-reader I planted $location. Sad... This one was quite expensive.
$trader speaking. We received new supply of gas masks.\nDon't worry, there is enough for everybody around.
$trader here. I need Fruit Punch samples, head to the anomalous fields nearby and bring as much as you can.

I don't recall seeing this number of Gas anomalies last time I came here in $map... The anomalous activity is unusual. We need to take necessary precautions, this could mean something's about to happen. $speaker out.
$mechanic here. I'm looking for samples from gravitational anomalies. It's for an experimental outfit upgrade I'm currently working on.\nMake sure to bring me what you can find.
Someone let $mechanic know that his experimental shock absorber that he installed on my suit works pretty well.\nWithout it, I wouldn't be sending this message.
This is the third scout team in $map.\nLet $trader know that we just found a small anomaly field that hasn't been registered yet.

This is $trader, reminding all personnel that the sample gathering for canine eye-tissue is nearly completed.\nJust go easy and don't be risky out there, better to lose a sample and save a research team.
This is $speaker and the technical team reporting that the new sensors are now active in $map.\nIf anyone has any problems, I would talk to $mechanic first - it's probably on his end.
This is $speaker... My group has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago $location. Requesting assistance immediately!
Help! we got jumped by $target $location. Two of my science group are suffering from serious injury, we can't afford more casualties!
This is $leader speaking. I received a report from our group $location.\nApparently they have been attacked by $target. They need immediate assistance!
One of our scientists went missing $location.\nThe last message I received from him was about spotting $target moving his way... Is there anyone nearby who can check out his location?
$speaker reporting in. A few minutes ago, I saw $target approaching our square. They are in big numbers, that seems really bad...\nWe are $location. Send some backup to our location.
What's going on? We lost contact with the group $location.\nSomeone saw $target roaming the place, I need more info about the situation there.
This is the rescue team sent to find the missing expedition $location.\nSorry to say that we found the remains of $speaker and five of his men.\nLooks like they were overrun by $target.
Please come in! This is $speaker and my research group has just fought off an attack of $target.\nWe're intact, but we're dangerously low on ammunition. Please advise!
Can anyone hear this? This is $speaker and I got cut-off from my team.\nWe were fighting off $target when I got separated and had to fight my way out.\nAny news from them?
$leader, I can hear heavy gunfire, sounds like it's from our colleagues $location.\nI think they may have run into those $target after all. We're on our way to support them.
This is $speaker. Requesting assistance immediately!\nMy group been attacked by $target a few minutes ago. We took position $location, hurry up!
Help us! we got attacked by $target in $map. Three researchers are suffering from serious injuries, we can't hold it any longer!
We have spotted $target approaching our location $location.\n$leader, is there any group nearby who can provide assassination?
A few minutes ago, my group engaged $target $location.\nThey fell back after killing two of them. One of the scientists got a serious injury.
$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $location, they might be preparing for something. All groups near the place should leave at once.
One of my group spotted $target heading our way. We took position $location. If they try something nasty, they will pay for it. $speaker out.
I got a report from unknown source about $target preparing for an ambush in $map. All groups at the location must take extreme caution.
We opened fire on $target after ignoring our clear warnings.\nLooks like more of them are heading this way, so we'll fall back and take position $location for now. $speaker out.
I've received information about possible raid in $map. Seems like $target are looking for trouble. Stay safe.
$leader, we're abandoning our mission after we spotted a large group of $target headed our way.\nThey might still be after us. We're not armed for this kind of thing!
This is $speaker with the observation post $location.\nWe've just witnessed a large firefight between $target and someone else. It's died down and we're hoping they don't come our way.
Attention field teams: this is $leader.\n$speaker and his group have been attacked in $map.\nIf there is anyone near by who is willing to help, I can assure extraordinary compensation.
This is $speaker. We met $target $location. One of them is suffering from a bad injury.\nI marked the location of our base for them. Make sure to provide them with medical assistance.
We got assistance from $target in $map.\n They have extra medical supplies. You can allow them to get into our base.
$target were asking for extra ammo. I met them $location. Looks like they're preparing for a hunting trip.
I saw $target roaming $location. They are searching for artefacts.\nOne of them, called $speaker, was asking us for extra Bear detectors. $leader, what do you think?
I was talking to $target we met $location. Their commander, $speaker, mentioned an unusual number of mutants heading this way.\nMy group took position and they agreed to provide necessary assistance.
We found dead bodies of $target here in $map, everything is messy... Seems like they got killed by unusual mutants.\nI'm about to reach my destination $location. $speaker out.
We came by $target on our way to the anomaly field. They're preparing for a raid on mutants spotted $location.\nWe'll join them for now, the research will be continued later.

This is the research team in $map.\nWe met some $target searching for artefacts and we decided to share the information we had about updated anomaly maps.\nHopefully $leader will permit this sort of thing.
After fleeing from hostile activity, we came to shelter $location and found a force of $target already there.\nRight now we're just waiting to see what happens. $speaker out.
Please inform $leader that the squad of $target who were kind enough to provide security for our sampling activities has now left.\nWe're headed back, it's too exposed here.
This is $speaker with the second observation team.\nWe came across a group of $target and nearly all of them are injured, some sort of mutant attack.\nWe're going to give them first aid.
After staying $location for awhile, we noticed some passing $target and they've agreed to guide us.\nWe're starting off now, wish us luck!
$clr_1Alkash Programmer\n$clr_2I need access to the internet. Is there any in the Bar, or perhaps over at Sidorovich's place?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I have to say, that guard in 100 Rads is such a nice fella. I wish those Duty pricks treated me like that.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Deals on sausage and bread have been real shitty as of late.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You guys heard that some transport in the Zone still works? Such a thing can be found in the Truck Cemetery, and it doesn't even need any gasoline! What a miracle.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Ha-ha-ha, the military have got themselves a real shit show right now. They were on some kind of raid and their helicopter got shot at... got ordered to return to base immediately.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Man, again Yantar is full of zombies. Careful there, people!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I keep hearing people mentioning someone called Strelok... Strelok this, Strelok that, Strelok whatever... what's the big deal, huh?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Don't head into any basements, they're full of mutants! Go around the top!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Get to cover, now. There's a helicopter around the old church.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Saw a group of shady guys, presumably Freedom. They're heading toward the Bar.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Saw a group of shady guys, presumably Duty. They're heading toward the Army Warehouses.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The military's pinned down in Agroprom, in the central complex!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Wish I had a house for four million! And how many artefacts am I going to have to collect for that?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Bored... I feel like putting holes in somebody.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Join the Monolith in order to avoid your collective and inevitable fates!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Yesterday I met an old friend of mine that had been missing. He didn't even recognise me, instead he immediately opened fire! Had to take him out... People, be careful around psy-emissions. Shooting former brothers of yours is not a simple task. At all.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2There was heavy fog in Yantar yesterday, made zombies impossible to spot from a distance.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Garik, get me out of Jupiter. I'm on the road right now, will be at Yanov Station in a second.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I hear Sakharov's got some new detectors!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2A group of five people are moving toward the Barrier, in all likelihood, Monolith. Take measures.

$clr_1Unknown source:\n$clr_2Just saw a big chimera who put a group of stalkers on a spectacular circus show. So you want to wander around, think twice. Turning around and leaving is better than lying here with an opened ass, like what just happened to these poor bastards.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Haha, loser. Why'd you leave your farm? And we've already cashed in.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Two-Three-Seven, we're heading back. Regroup.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Tired... I'm tired of everything... Creatures... Damn stalkers, damn anomalies!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2If any other stalker tries to enter the Agroprom, I'm gonna get Duty to lock him up in the arena cages.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Zhurov, we're out of free hands. We need you and a few other guys to prepare a burial for a couple of bodies. They'll be sent to the south as Cargo 200 in a couple of days.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Fuck this weather. It goes from clear, to rain, to a fucking blowout in just a couple of hours!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Together we shall protect the Monolith!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The mutants have increased in number, leaving us with no fucking breathing room. What is Duty even up to?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Know, infidels, that we are strong and you are weak. Run, and we will catch you. Hide, and we will find you.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2What fucker snatched all the loot from my stash? The one in the Wild Territory. I know you're reading this... Prepare your sorry ass.

$clr_1Unknown source:\n$clr_2Peregrine Falcon, watching a shootout. A group of stalkers are fighting a large mutant... can't make out... I'm going to withdraw. Yes, switch the channel to a different frequency, this one is bugged...
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2What's the point, to be dragged somewhere. Uh, there'd better be a bar in the Cordon.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We'll track the crashed helicopter in the Swamps while no-one's there.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Who the hell trashed my vodka stash?... For whoever did this, wish you'd have choked on it, scumbag!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The command of the peacekeeping contingent for the isolation of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone is announcing recruitment into the ranks of the military stalkers: pork, horilka, endless ammunition, and a free burial are all guaranteed.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Any smartass brave enough to enter our territory will be given hell.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Anyone seen flying black smoke in the Wild Territory? Fuck me... Is it some kind of new poltergeist?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm pinned down by a bunch of looters, help me out!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Lukash, we've dealt with the mercs. Heading back as we speak.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Lukash, Duty's over at the farmstead again. Why?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Army Warehouses. Apparently, there's not a chunk left of the pilots. Someone totally fucked that helicopter.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I wiped this zone and why did I just come here? Money. Yes, we have fattened with our blood and sweat the cocksuckers in the government, that earn while doing fucking shit, and we are here, obliged to crawl for pathetic crumbs.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Guys, there are some real strange things going on in the Zone. Ever heard stories about top secret experiments?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Bros, any info on the next blowout?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The Swamps are restless today. You can get stuck in the mud, and there are lots of creatures around. They are coming straight from the ground, goddammit.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We're seeing a wave of mutants coming from the northern gorge.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We're seeing a wave of mutants coming from the east, presumably from the Darkscape.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We're seeing a wave of mutants coming from the north-west. See the attached coordinates.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I just spotted a couple of helicopters heading north. Sending coordinates. We'll remain hidden - I don't know what their instructions are.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2A bunch of helicopters just passed by in the Swamps. What the hell are they up to here? I've heard nothing about any planned sweeps or operations in these areas, and my sources are reliable. Something sketchy's going on... Keep your eyes peeled, boys.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2People! Be careful in the village by the Army Warehouses - a Burnt Fuzz has grown on the pillars!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Anyone been to the Red Forest? I was planning on heading there, seems like there's some good loot to be found.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2People, I'm looking through my binoculars - seems like a new party of soldiers has arrived! I suggest staying out of sight for a couple of days. They're combing the area, but the Zone's gonna chew 'em up anyway.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm in the Swamps, it hurts me... The skin is peeling off, my hair is falling out... What the hell is wrong with me?!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Some people do not learn anything and don't want to, have they seen too many American films or are they blinded by greed? You tell them about the anomalies, they tell you about the loot - they don't want to think about anything, 'cept for dosh, until their guts get scattered on the branches.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Trust no-one but the Monolith and your fellow brothers. No-one.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2How many hounds are going to keep running around Rostok? When is Duty gonna deal with them already? Man, fuck this. I'm going to find someone who actually keeps their word.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Handing out an exoskeleton for free! And now that I've got your attention - I offer to sell a Wrenched artefact, price negotiable.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Is it safe to pass through the Garbage?!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Came to the Zone and thought I'd come across new sights to see and lots of mutants to hunt... and what do I get? Guard duty all day long at a stupid checkpoint with jack shit to do!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Seems like the military aren't sending any choppers to the area around Rostok after their last one got shot down.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We've accessed the southern tunnel of the facility, heading downwards into the underground. The Red Forest is visible from the windows. It's quiet here.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Got attacked by a pseudodog, barely made it out!
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2Deck yourselves out, eggheads. Brothers, who took care of you at first, who gave you the vodka, eh? Those stubborn scientists? Or uncle Sid? Bring those artefacts to me!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Anyone heard about some new guy at the mercenary base in Pripyat? Seems like he's got some unique equipment you can order.
