$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You heard about one of the sentries shooting himself? I'm having second feelings about joining the patrol.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I overheard some military discussions. Seems like they're planning an op in Yantar.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Death to non-believers!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I feel like sleeping
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Stalkers, Sakharov is paying decent money for loot!... And is looking for someone to send to Lab X-16. I'm not going there, too risky. Full of psy-emissions... and zombies.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2A pack of dogs is coming at us, sending coordinates
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You shitheads want a taste of a heat-seeking missile? Who taught you to fire an RPG?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Damn, who emptied my stash?

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Time for a commercial! You wanna be a real lad in the Zone? Get some dirt on your boot, earning plenty of loot? Live on the cushion? Join the bandits! We've got the one right perspective on the Zone.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Need to leave the Zone, pronto.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Some dude in the Garbage got hold of a pretty rare gizmo.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Sold some mutant parts to Sidorovich, and it seems like I got ripped off, that old fart... People, best you trade with Barman instead.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm leaving the Zone shortly, I'm done with it, I can't stand it any longer.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Ha, how many blockheads have rushed to the North in recent times.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Hemul, head to the Bar. Got some work for you!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Rumour has it that there's a controller dwelling inside X-16, and maybe not even one. Several experienced stalkers ventured there yesterday and haven't returned since.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Who are those bozos near the farm in merc gear? I ain't even thinking of goin' near there!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Damn rifle jamming on me again, and this is happening right after I took it to the technician from Duty in Rostok! What else could I have expected from an alcoholic? If your gear needs repairing, he's the type to stay away from.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Agh, there's a broken tank somewhere in the Red Forest, somewhere in a thicket. They say there's still a PKM left with a few rounds, but I can't look around for it by myself.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Did my pockets grow or something? Seems like it...
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I heard that Kremlin sends their own people into the Zone. It'll be interesting to watch them.
$clr_1Arnie\n$clr_2Fighting at midnight tonight. Don't miss it.
$clr_1Ashot\n$clr_2Attention: I am now at Yanov Station. Don't go looking for me in the Warehouses, fellas. I offer you wonderful products at the lowest prices.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2If anyone stumbles upon any documents containing information about the area around the Radar and the Scorcher, let me know.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2I'm going to explain this one more time for the boneheaded. There are no programmers in the back room of the Bar that are responsible for any messages you receive on your PDAs.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2Are you looking for a drink, a good firearm, a lot of money, and a conversation with reliable partners? Come to the 100 Rads Bar!
$clr_1Swamp Doctor\n$clr_2Egh, Strelok... how I need you right now. I don't even know who else to turn to with my problems.
$clr_1Bolt\n$clr_2I ain't feeling good... Had some canned food, apparently from a warehouse. I looked at the expiration date, and I've screwed up bad.
$clr_1Beard\n$clr_2There's work for anyone willing to get their hands dirty. Come to the Skadovsk.

$clr_1Voronin\n$clr_2If I find out that you take bribes from stalkers passing through the Bar, I'm going to print and sign death warrants for each and every individual responsible before I put it in their coffins.
$clr_1Hawaiian\n$clr_2Hola, ese! Got some work for anyone wandering around Jupiter - come visit the Yanov Station!
$clr_1Hermann\n$clr_2A reminder to all stalkers that it is necessary to subscribe to the newsletter regarding any emissions in the Zone. The information is always accurate and up-to-date.
$clr_1Groza\n$clr_2Prophet, I'm heading back to base. Got tons of artefacts!
$clr_1Gromov\n$clr_2I need tools, come to me if you find anything suitable.
$clr_1Gromov\n$clr_2Guys, where did Zulu go? Nobody saw him?
$clr_1Deserter\n$clr_2Selling army goods! I have a lot of stuff, from unique weapons to ammo as well as armour. Everyone who knows where I am, come up. Whoever doesn't know will never learn.
$clr_1Digger\n$clr_2Need 5-6 stalkers for a raid on the catacombs. As soon as I find my PDA, we'll be on the move.
$clr_1Digger\n$clr_2Gathering people for a raid on the catacombs.
$clr_1Digger\n$clr_2We're in need of two more stalkers for a raid in the catacombs.
$clr_1Zhurov\n$clr_2Enough with the harassment at the perimeter already. We'll be covering the entirety of your village with mortar fire if this doesn't cease.
$clr_1Ivan Pisser\n$clr_2Heard some news: someone wants to get through to the Scorcher once again.
$clr_1Snitch\n$clr_2If you need information, go to the Bar.
$clr_1Snitch\n$clr_2Got a little job for an agile newbie, paying well.
$clr_1Kitsenko\n$clr_2Psss, where can I get a little smoke?
$clr_1Kuznetsov\n$clr_2Combat battalion, knock back some good vodka, raid in 3 minutes! Get the squad ready and move out!
$clr_1Kuznetsov\n$clr_2This morning, five privates were missing from the drill... presumably deserters. I will be grateful for anyone who finds these degenerates.
$clr_1Kurgan\n$clr_2I can modify the firmware in the PDA, look for me in the Bar.
$clr_1Leon\n$clr_2That's enough, quit the spamming.
$clr_1Loki\n$clr_2Hey, Duty, how are you doing without Jupiter? Good thing your founder's little backstory got revealed.
$clr_1Baldy\n$clr_2The bandits showed up again in the Dark Valley, not good. We'll eradicate them.
$clr_1Makar\n$clr_2If only I could leave this mess, buy a flat in the city, and get some work in a studio.
$clr_1Maslyak\n$clr_2I heard it again from the speakers at the checkpoint. Someone's laughing louder and louder, laughing more aggressively, like a maniac.
$clr_1Maslyak\n$clr_2I can't do this any more. Every day, the blood in my veins chills.

$clr_1Lukash\n$clr_2Free stalkers! Our men at the Army Warehouses welcome you at any time. Here, you will find true friends and comrades, good attitudes, and much more! The Zone is our home: reflect on whether you see yourself outside the Zone and help us deal with Duty once and for all.
$clr_1Butcher\n$clr_2I always have a job for a good hunter. Come to the flea market.
$clr_1Father Peter\n$clr_2Let us pray, brethren, for the peace of the soul of Yuri Semetsky! Amen!
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2Third squad, the raid to catch monsters for the arena has not been cancelled! Come on, get out of the Bar! Do you want to be like those anarchist weirdos?!
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2Everyone! The delivery of ammunition has to be conducted at the specified hours! Do I have to spend the night here?!!
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2There is work for the veterans, we pay a considerable sum.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2There's work for free stalkers, adequate payments.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2I'm offering a job to shoot mutants.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2I purchase artefacts for research, come visit the Duty outpost at Rostok. If there's no money, I'll trade for something else.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2Everyone on the parade grounds on the double. Whoever misses it will be discharged from Duty immediately.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2We're having temporary difficulties with maintaining the private channel. If you need something, write to me personally.
$clr_1Gunpowder\n$clr_2Sanya, are you seeing this too? What's this dumb fuck doing near the bushes? It's been three freaking days! Can I bust his ass already?
$clr_1Gatekeeper\n$clr_2Once again for those "particularly gifted": do not go to the bridge in the DL, our snipers will calm you down instantly. Limansk is under the Syndicate's control.
$clr_1Limpid\n$clr_2Guys, if you find any toolkit, bring it to me! I got basically nothing.
$clr_1Limpid\n$clr_2Anyone who's out hunting... you grab some PDAs for me, we can deal.
$clr_1Rogovets\n$clr_2Here we go again, the vodka ran out again, that's it. How can I treat the nerves of the guys without it?
$clr_1Romka\n$clr_2I require a stalker, who's a specialist in code locks and with experience in raids in the North of the Zone.
$clr_1Peregrine\n$clr_2Die, scum.
$clr_1Sakharov\n$clr_2We require parts of rare mutants for further research. We pay well for every good sample. Those who are interested, come to the mobile bunker in Yantar.
$clr_1Sakharov\n$clr_2General, could you send another five of your men? At the agreed price.
$clr_1Sakharov\n$clr_2Dear stalkers! Our research requires a large number of new artefacts, as many as you can bring. More than a decent payment guaranteed.
$clr_1Senka\n$clr_2Oh, I'd love me a cold beer right now... Anyone knows where to get some?
$clr_1Sergey\n$clr_2To whoever has tools for basic, fine, and calibration work: bring them to me.
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2There's always work, both for the rookies, and for the veterans. Payment as usual, heh.
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2Rookies, come to me for work - you can gain experience, earn some money and purchase ammunition.
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2The life of an entrepreneur in the Zone is as dangerous as a stalker's. I'll reward everyone who ensures the safety of my business.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2If you want some brand-new, foreign weapon, come to me.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2We've got some good pot. Come and get some, let's chillax for a bit!
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2If you feel like going on a raid, you can stock up at my place. Also got some dirty work, anyone who does it will get a rare artefact.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2I buy PDAs containing any valuable information, bring everything to me, more money has never hurt anyone.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2I got hold of some toilet paper. Those who are tired of burdocks, come quickly, stocks are limited.
$clr_1Sultan\n$clr_2Brothers, when you find Sleeper you can put him down for good... but grab his PDA and bring it to me.
$clr_1Owl\n$clr_2Buying PDAs with any valuable information. Bring everything to me, and I'll give as good as one gets.
$clr_1Cardan:\n$clr_2Ehhhh... Hello everyone. Just woke up, I'm waiting for a drink.

$clr_1Biggie\n$clr_2Anyone else hear that? There's something playing in the Meadow near the factory. At midnight. So creepy, and yet, so horrifyingly familiar. But I can't remember where exactly I've heard it.
$clr_1Fanatic\n$clr_2To anyone who has not yet been in the village - don't miss the unique opportunity of learning the necessary survival skills from me.
$clr_1Fanatic\n$clr_2People, has anyone seen Wolf?
$clr_1Fanatic\n$clr_2Need help in sweeping mutants' lairs, contact me.
$clr_1Hakim\n$clr_2Sanya, I'm heading back to base with Snake.
$clr_1Hog\n$clr_2I need some more tools for my work. Any mercenaries who aren't out doing any contracts, please help me out. You won't regret the payment.
$clr_1Hog\n$clr_2Best stay away from the Wild Territory. You won't find anything worthwhile there.
$clr_1Hog\n$clr_2Soon, I'll be replenishing my rock collection.
$clr_1Trunk\n$clr_2We need stalkers with raiding experience deep into the Zone. Payment is appropriate. If anyone's interested, contact me and we'll discuss the details.
$clr_1Chechnya\n$clr_2Hunting is cool, I gotta say.
$clr_1Six\n$clr_2Lukash, Duty's at the farmstead again. Why?
$clr_1Nimble\n$clr_2Stalkers! I accept all kinds of PDAs with any valuable information, bring everything to me. The money won't hurt
$clr_1Yar\n$clr_2Hey, Ashot, how's Yanov? Must be cosy, you lousy spoon-fed fighter.
$clr_1Yarik Athlete\n$clr_2There's a sucker in the Dark Valley wandering around with a cool shooter. If someone offs him, I'll buy it.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We shall cleanse the world from sin!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2One day the Zone shall purify this sinful world. Join us to live in a peaceful paradise, or perish with the rest.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Misha! Misha, come in! You've been in there too long, are you ok? Misha, pick up! Ok, alright Misha, we're coming in to get you. Alright, the door - now go!
$clr_1Captain Quarterblad\n$clr_2We've had another break in. All soldiers on the checkpoint need to account for their actions for the past 12 hours. This is not a request.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2This is... Pavel. I'm on my last magazine and everyone else is dead. The fanatics have trapped me in here, and they're closing in. Goodbye.
$clr_1Hawk\n$clr_2Alright, shithead! I'm coming for you! I know exactly where you're going and I can tell you where you're going next: into a fucking coffin!
$clr_1Drak\n$clr_2Things are going to be changing around here, suckers! That's right, the king is back! This is my Zone, so bow down and kiss my feet, piggies!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Basil... I'm sorry. I know you're probably dead and that it's probably my fault. I was weak. I know. I just couldn't... I hate myself for it, you know. I'm so sorry Basil, my friend. Please forgive me.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Yeah, that guy's back again - just standing there. Shooting didn't do any good last time, what do we do?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Oh, Anton... you're my best mate, you are. I had, uh... 12 bottles? Or was it 21... We go way back, Anton...
$clr_1Georgian\n$clr_2Don't give me that shit about 250 gram loads again. I'm telling you, 300 is the only way to fly. Maybe when you start reloading your own cartridges, you'll understand.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I had another dream. I was out on the usual patrol, and then my feet kept sinking in the ground and it was harder and harder to keep moving. I was yelling to my buddies ahead of me, but they didn't hear me. Then I was sunk up to my waist and I heard footsteps behind me and I couldn't turn. That's when I woke up.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Today is my birthday.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2There's some dickhead hiding on the factory roof just shooting people as they walk by.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2If anyone's missing a toe, I think I just found it.

$clr_1Argus\n$clr_2This is a message to anyone in the vicinity: did you see the light that was just in the sky? About three minutes ago, there was a greenish light that grew larger and larger and then it just blinked out. Anyone?
$clr_1Walrus\n$clr_2Here, doggy, doggy, doggy...

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Not a single shitty artefact... I dragged my ass over a mile of broken metal and wild animals in this stinking sweat-box and I followed ALL of the steps and a big nothing I got for my troubles. Screw you!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Willing to trade a Stone Blood for a pound of real tea. Not kidding.
$clr_1Vincent\n$clr_2He can't get far. Not with that amount of blood loss...
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm out! I got my swag and I'm leaving! See you suckers later!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2No matter what we do, we can't get this door to stay shut. It's creeping out the men - they don't like sleeping next to it.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Americans here. I hid as they went by and heard them talking. Up to no good, as usual...
$clr_1Graf\n$clr_2If anyone cares to see Nikita Rocketeer again, they better hurry. He doesn't have many teeth left, and then we're moving on to the eyes. You know where to find us.
$clr_1Popov\n$clr_2Giving away a shooter: SKS in good condition, Soviet manufacture. I can't keep it anymore, it's... tainted.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2And for you, my darling... There's letters to receive... Goodbye, the trumpet sounds...
$clr_1Nabby\n$clr_2What's everyone crying about? This Zone stuff is easy.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Alyosha: I just can't stop thinking about that room. It's just sitting there, undisturbed... waiting for me.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Major Bulgakov is in urgent need of harmonica lessons. He's beginning to damage the hearing capabilities of our soldiers. Direct all applications to the nearest Ukrainian Army post.

$clr_1Sgt. Stefcheck\n$clr_2For the last time, shut the hell up! If you two don't stop chatting on duty, I'm going to come over there and beat your heads into the ground. Every stalker in ten kilometers can hear your racket!
$clr_1Postman\n$clr_2New textile supplies from the outside! Negotiating large-scale purchases for faction quartermasters.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Hate to say it, but Mikhail bit the dust. He was aggravated and took shots at a passing chopper... I think you get the idea.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2This is just inane fucking babble! We got screwed over, guys. Probably, the recording doesn't event exist.
$clr_1Marko\n$clr_2Something got into my sleeping bag while I was away... I'm not going back in there. Hell no.
$clr_1Gritsenko\n$clr_2How can I do my work with all of Hell's demons howling outside? Get a security detail together, or I'm taking the night off.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You don't have to feel bad: the body is already cold. We weren't even close.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The PDA says the stash is buried here, but I can't find shit and it's getting very uncomfortable out here. Dammit...
$clr_1Glum\n$clr_2Bringing you the very first Zone-baked bread! It's pretty good too! Wash it down with some vodka, and it's perfect!
$clr_1Shloss\n$clr_2If you can hear this, Max and Matthias, we're going to wait at the camp for three more days. Then we have to move on. I'm sorry.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Something big just crashed north of Radar. Is the army getting antsy again? Or maybe NATO is just learning the hard way.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Willing to give half my haul to anyone who helps me carry it out of here. My co-ordinates are... well, shit.
$clr_1Wallace\n$clr_2I'm telling you, if you punks don't stay outside of the perimeter, you're going to catch a real bad case of acute lead poisoning.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Whose brilliant idea was the home-made shells? Misfiring while a bloodsucker is staring you in the face is not a good time.
$clr_1Echo 1\n$clr_2Good hit! I saw the tracer: went through the abdomen. Hell of a shot.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Oh hell... no water... I'm dying, man. I can't... just can't. I'm stopping here.
$clr_1Bessant\n$clr_2Not so tough now, you fuck. A whole mag of 9x39 right in its ugly face. The beast is dead.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Galkin! That bastard is still out there! We just got shot at again and there's no sign of him. He must be wearing a camouflage suit or something.
$clr_1#11145\n$clr_2One. Seven. Six. Seven. Eight. One. Nine. Nine. Nine. Four. Seven. One. Three. Nine. Zero. Zero. One. Six. End. End.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Why can't I see anything? Get me the hell out of here! Captain! Can you hear me? Fuck! I can't see! What- I- Help!
$clr_1Loris\n$clr_2I hope you're getting here soon, Swill. I hear all sorts of crazy stuff at night.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The man who just killed the loner is currently sitting around in Yanov station hoping no one will notice. The one with the wounded leg.
$clr_1Marya\n$clr_2Did the message get through?
$clr_1Pigeon\n$clr_2Hungry. Really hungry... If I don't get anything soon, I'm cooking this snork hand.
$clr_1Pyotr Circassian\n$clr_2Alright! I'm out on the market again - electrical and mechanical engineer with 20 years of experience. Contact me and we can negotiate terms.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I thought I ordered someone to get rid of these carcasses? Now the entire complex smells terrible.
$clr_1Natan\n$clr_2It's been a bad day, guys. Really bad. I just need to get this shit out. Just... it's so messed up. Having second thoughts here, guys.
$clr_1Trapper\n$clr_2Will they come back tomorrow? Everyone keeps asking me that. I'm not a prophet, OK? I can tell you how to kill 'em, but they can do what they like.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Haha! Those dumb bastards walked right into the anomalies! That's some poetic justice if I've ever seen it! Enjoy your spoils while you can, you scummy thieves.
$clr_1Cashier\n$clr_2I wouldn't go out there if I were you, guy - it sounds angry. It's not always as dead as it looks, alright?
$clr_1Nilson\n$clr_2Isn't where we left the other guys? At the rusty water tank? Fuck sake, didn't they wait for us? This isn't good. Meet us around back near the hole in the fence. And stay ready.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Some sad little punks are trying to sell off fake artefacts made out of clay and electric lights. I don't imagine any of you will be dumb enough to fall for it, but... it is the Zone after all.

$clr_1Churin
$clr_2I can still remember when this dockyard was offloading containers from the cargo ships... long days of work, pennies for pay... but I remember looking out across the waters right before the sun set... it was like a lake of fire.

Now that place is a gray swamp haunted with monsters.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'll see you guys soon, alright? I've got to run this to a buddy up past the Red Forest. I'll- uh, well just wish me luck. I think I'm going to need it.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I visited the medic this morning, he told me I might have cancer, that I need to go back in normal world, get a proper medical exam... Don't know why I'm telling you this. Probably because I don't really have anyone else to tell that to. No family, and all my friends are gone. Now I either have to spend all my money on therapy... or die. If only there was some artifact to cure it, but I guess it's not for me to find. Don't go into anomaly fields guys, stop wasting your lives on this dead soil. Go home.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Have you ever wondered how is it to be zombified? Like, what's happening in your head?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Dang, when I raise money, I'll buy myself a golden AK. And handgun. Desert Eagle. Then I'll go straight to CNPP, and even if I die, I'll die with style.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Have you ever seen man being sucked into a Vortex? Coolest thing I've ever seen.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Why there is always only one brand of beer in the Bar? I'm sick of drinking that piss, give me a dark one for God's sake!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2To everyone who whines in chat about how hard their life is: you don't know crap. I'm allergic to dust. In the Zone. Allergic to dust.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I was in the swamps lately. Decided to spend night at old church. Suddenly, I woke up in the middle of the night, because I heard strange noise, like someone was digging outside. I took my gun with me and went to investigate what smartass had the brilliant idea to dig dirt in such place. So I approached cemetery fence and then.. I see a coffin with dead man inside, flying around crosses, and zombified men standing alongside road, with scythes in their hands... And then, silence!

$clr_1Kir
$clr_2You are all fools. You believe in the Wish Granter, the Oasis, the Compass and other rumors. But I I know there is a Time Machine in the Zone. Yes, dont be surprised. Its here. And Im only one who knows where. It was built by the people from the future, back in 84, to freely travel through time. I was just a kid back then.
The future its wonderful. Its like an old Soviet sci-fi movie turned real. That machine that I saw in Moscow no longer exists. I spent years, decades to find out other one. Even with access to secret archives it was tough. But one small newspaper article led me to a clue. Turned out some young scientist worked with space-time barriers back in the 70's, for real! This article disappeared from open archives and the names of the scientists were classified, because all of them went to work on secret projects in the Exclusion Zone after CNPP meltdown in '86. But one of them went missing even before Chernobyl disaster! By the method of elimination I found him. Even found out where he lived. For one more year I was searching, where creators hid their invention. Now, the moment of truth. Machine is working. Inventors notes helped me to repair it back to operational state. I send this message to everyone Ive ever known here. To my friends: Im not dead, everything is going to be great. Ill find you someday. Or at least tell your grandchildren who you are and what wonderful people you were to me. For everyone else: good luck.

Alisa, dont cry, I promised Ill be back in no time. I missed you so much wait a second; let me just turn off this thing
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Comrades musicians! Anyone has chords for Tsoy's "Blood Type"?

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The strangest thing in my entire life happened today. I was at some apartment block near Limansk, when some dusty old phone in next room started ringing. It became louder and louder, and I just froze in place out of fear. Suddenly it became so loud it felt like my eardrums going to explode and my legs were like spaghetti. I took the phone, trying not to pass out. Young woman's voice on the phone said something like: "Dima, hi, are you going to movies tonight? I heard they're gonna show Courier again and girls saw it and...". Being half-deaf already, I screamed "Wrong number!" and hung up. I felt huge relief and for some reason... guilt. Someone started crying right at the front door of the apartment, I jumped out the window and ran like hell leaving my gun behind. True story.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Hey, low-lifes, you can stop hiding in those bushes. I see you. Say auf wiedersehen to your bandit balls.

$clr_2Monolith is a statement to the humanity: why you try to play gods to achieve riches and wealth when you can just become one? Join us and be a real god amongst the living if you prove yourself worthy to Monolith.

$clr_2Monolith is something you can't understand. Something you wish to destroy out of primal fear. But we understand it. We know what's it capable of. It can save the world. We need you to help us. Together we can change the future of whole humanity.

$clr_1Prometheus
$clr_2Why are you fighting against us? Why do you hate Monolith? Don't you see? Your leaders don't care what you believe in, they don't have values. They think only about themselves. For them all of you are pawns, it's just business. All the things your faction stands for is a lie. They have no goal. No meaning. Only greed. Monolith can show you the way. It can help you achieve your deepest desires. We are not here because we told to by some man that wants to rule the Zone. We are here because it's the Zone who asked us to protect it, in exchange for its infinite wisdom.

$clr_1Greek

$clr_1Prometheus
$clr_2Monolith awaits. Don't try to fool it with lies. Don't wish for wealth or immortality, because It can see what you really want. You want to be respected. You want to be desired. You want to be loved. You want to mean something in this life. People think you are nobody. They will abandon you, steal, lie, cheat, betray, because they don't care. Monolith cares. It cares about its children more than a mother cares about hers. Monolith is here to help you find the way.

some sort of awful ritual murder - I'm not going into details
apparent strangulation
some sort of psy emission killed him as he slept. I don't think he suffered

drowned in a small pool? Something else happened here

teeth marks on vital areas. They look disturbingly human-like
trapped in an underground chamber, he seems to have died of dehydration and malnutrition
his throat was cut as he slept

something very strange is happening to the body it... it seems to be fading out of existence!

Almost like evening...
Bricks were shat all night at the camp. Terrible night!
Fucking burers had a yell fest yesterday. Or... were they fractures?

Guys, wake up! It's morning already!
Guys, it's dawning... It's so beautiful.

I hope the weather stays like this for a while.

Who am I kidding? The weather in the Zone isn't always that bad.

yyy...eyh....s.seee... aaar....
